scripts.prepare:ropsten: node scripts/generate-config --network ropsten && mustache config/ropsten.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare:kovan: node scripts/generate-config --network kovan && mustache config/kovan.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare:mainnet: node scripts/generate-config --network mainnet && mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:ropsten: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ shoyunft/shoyu-ropsten subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:kovan: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ shoyunft/shoyu-kovan subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:mainnet: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ shoyunft/shoyu subgraph.yaml
